author: Lisa Kondo
title: Innova announces updated version of first marketing automation tool “made in Japan”
text:
Cloud CMO 2.0 aims on “making marketing simple”, with easy-to-use, yet powerful features that cover the entire marketing process. The updated version of Cloud CMO enables marketers to manage all their marketing activities – from increasing visibility to generating and nurturing leads – with one single tool. Thanks to a user-friendly, intuitive and simple interface, marketers can do everything themselves, without a big marketing budget or IT-support.
Cloud CMO 2.0 provides the following functions:
Visibility
· CMS (Website Creation & Management)
· SEO Keyword Report
· Native Advertisement Distribution
Lead Generation
· Landing Page Creation
· CRM Integration
· Dashboard
Lead Nurturing
· Email Marketing
· Lead Management & Segmentation
· Lead Scoring
With the new version of Cloud CMO, Innova Inc. responds to the needs of companies that want to grow their business with effective inbound and content marketing, but don’t have the capacities and resources to deal with complicated marketing automation solutions. This applies especially to Japanese marketing professionals who have only recently started to discover and apply inbound and content marketing strategies.
“Cloud CMO 2.0 is a very important step to make our vision ‘to create a happy end for all sellers and buyers around the world’ come true.” says Sunao Munakata, Founder and CEO of Innova Inc. “I am confident that it will help marketers create valuable and eventually profitable relationships with their prospects and customers, as well as significantly improve their processes.”
About Innova
Innova is a Japanese marketing startup founded in 2011 by Sunao Munakata. The company currently serves over 200 B2B and B2C companies from all industries.
Innova’s vision is to ‘create a happy end for all sellers and buyers around the world’. To make this vision come true, the company provides the technology and services that enable buyers and sellers to connect seamlessly:
Cloud CMO is a marketing automation tool that aims to make marketing simple, especially for small and medium-sized businesses. (For further information, visit: http://innova-jp.com/cloud-cmo/ )
Innova’s content marketing strategy consulting as well as content creation services help marketers and business owners build valuable relationships with their target audience, consistently create high-quality content and sustainably grow their business. (For further information, visit: http://innova-jp.com/content-creation/ )
